data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Ysyk-Köl to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ysyk-Köl, Kyrgyzstan

data.prayer: Father, move the 1,322 believers in the state of Ysyk-Köl to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 330 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Ysyk-Köl.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Ysyk-Köl to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Pashtun, Northern people might believe through him.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Ysyk-Köl, Kyrgyzstan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1,322 believers in Ysyk-Köl.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary:
the state of Ysyk-Köl, Kyrgyzstan has a population of 437,200.

We estimate Ysyk-Köl has 1,322 people who might know Jesus, 14,889 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 420,989 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 330 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ysyk-Köl. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

location.name: Ysyk-Köl
location.people_groups_list: Kalmyk-Oirat, Kazakh, Dungan, Hui, Muslim Chinese, Lezgin
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kalmyk-Oirat (3,700), Kazakh (27,000), Dungan (67,000), Hui, Muslim Chinese (2,000), Lezgin (2,700)
